EmailTemplate.subject: 5 Blogs to Read Pre-VMworld
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
5 Pre-VMworld Must-Read Blogs
- The Peaking Workload Problem - Can you be healthy AND rich? <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/virtualization/peaking-workload-problem-can-healthy-rich/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=5blogsvmworld>
- 3 Reasons I Hate Alerts (and What To Do About It) <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/virtualization/reasons-to-hate-alert-what-to-do-about-it/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=5blogsvmworld>
- How Bon Jovi Taught Me How to Adapt to the Cloud <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/how-bon-jovi-taught-me-to-adapt-cloud/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=5blogsvmworld>
- Devs are from Venus Ops are from Mars Part 1 <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/devs-venus-ops-mars/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=5blogsvmworld>
- Devs are from Venus Ops are from Mars Part 2 <http://vmturbo.com/about-virtualization/devs-venus-ops-mars-pt-2-application-scalabilty-contd/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=5blogsvmworld>
